entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
